articles.author: Brad Brooks
articles.title: Alec Baldwin manslaughter case dropped by New Mexico prosecutor - Reuters
articles.description: A New Mexico criminal case against actor Alec Baldwin stemming from a fatal shooting on the set of his movie "Rust" in 2021 ended on Monday, with a prosecutor dropping her appeal of the case's dismissal.
